V

validateCustomer(String) - Method in class com.cigital.insecurepay.service.TransferValidationService
validateCustomer is a function that calls an instance of LoginDao to validate the username of the customer.
validateLogin(ForgotPasswordBO) - Method in class com.cigital.insecurepay.service.ForgotPasswordService
validateLogin is a function that calls an instance of ForgotPasswordDao to query the database and reset the password.
validateLogin(LoginBO) - Method in class com.cigital.insecurepay.service.LoginService
validateLogin is a function that validates the credentials sent by the user against the database credentials using LoginDao.
validateUser(ForgotPasswordBO) - Method in class com.cigital.insecurepay.dao.ForgotPasswordDao
validateUser is a function that checks if the incoming user in the request is a valid user.
validateUser(LoginBO) - Method in class com.cigital.insecurepay.dao.LoginDao
validateUser is a function that queries the database to see if the login attempt is valid.
